mapper.select: SELECT STEXT_NOTICE_DATETIME AS stextNoticeDatetime, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, BRANCH_GUBUN AS branchGubun, OPER_START_GUBUN AS operStartGubun, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, SECURITY_CORP_CODE AS securityCorpCode, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE AS checkOperEnable, OPER_DAY AS operDay, ADDR AS addr, INSTALL_PLACE AS installPlace, DETAIL_FAC_INFO AS detailFacInfo FROM ATMS_02001200

SELECT STEXT_NOTICE_DATETIME AS stextNoticeDatetime, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, BRANCH_GUBUN AS branchGubun, OPER_START_GUBUN AS operStartGubun, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, SECURITY_CORP_CODE AS securityCorpCode, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE AS checkOperEnable, OPER_DAY AS operDay, ADDR AS addr, INSTALL_PLACE AS installPlace, DETAIL_FAC_INFO AS detailFacInfo FROM ATMS_02001200 WHERE STEXT_NOTICE_DATETIME = #{stextNoticeDatetime}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001200 SET STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, PLACE_GUBUN = #{placeGubun}, BRANCH_GUBUN = #{branchGubun}, OPER_START_GUBUN = #{operStartGubun}, OPER_START_TIME = #{operStartTime}, OPER_END_TIME = #{operEndTime}, SECURITY_CORP_CODE = #{securityCorpCode}, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE = #{checkOperEnable}, OPER_DAY = #{operDay}, ADDR = #{addr}, INSTALL_PLACE = #{installPlace}, DETAIL_FAC_INFO = #{detailFacInfo} WHERE STEXT_NOTICE_DATETIME = #{stextNoticeDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001200 ( STEXT_NOTICE_DATETIME, STEXT_GUBUN, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, PLACE_GUBUN, BRANCH_GUBUN, OPER_START_GUBUN, OPER_START_TIME, OPER_END_TIME, SECURITY_CORP_CODE, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE, OPER_DAY, ADDR, INSTALL_PLACE, DETAIL_FAC_INFO ) VALUES ( #{stextNoticeDatetime}, #{stextGubun}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{placeGubun}, #{branchGubun}, #{operStartGubun}, #{operStartTime}, #{operEndTime}, #{securityCorpCode}, #{checkOperEnable}, #{operDay}, #{addr}, #{installPlace}, #{detailFacInfo} )
